Description:
Summon a blade of Void energy that converts your basic attacks to melee.

Tap Basic Attack to perform a quick slash that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.VoidGauntlet_Blade_Light.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage or hold to perform a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">thrust</font> attack that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.VoidGauntlet_Blade_Heavy.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. Both attacks inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Disintegrate</font> on successful hits, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second and reducing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.ABSStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Disintegrate</font> stacks up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.StackMax]}</font> times and lasts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade.BaseDuration]}s</font>.

Costs <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.73.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> on start, increasing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font>.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Upgrade_VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade_CritDmg.CritDamage * 100]}%</font> critical damage on Void Blade attacks.

Successful <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">thrust</font> attacks <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> self for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_VoidBlade_HealOnHvy.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage per <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Disintegrate</font> stack on target. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

Summon a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_AoE.Radius]}m</font> radius circular rift of Void energy at your feet for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6s</font> that deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_DoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second to enemies and grants <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> to self and friendlies, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Empower.DMGCorruption * 100]}%</font>.\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.74.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Your attacks inflict <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weaken</font> to targets inside the radius, reducing their damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Weaken.DMGCorruption * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Weaken.BaseDuration]}s</font> per hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_Weaken.StackMax]} times.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_NullChamber_BonusStamina.Stamina]}</font> stamina per second for self and friendlies while inside the radius.

Unleash a Void-infused scream, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.VoidGauntlet_Scream.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">staggering</font> and inflicting <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">root</font> to enemies <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">5m</font> in front of you. Disables enemy movement for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Scream.BaseDuration]}s</font>.\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.75.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Root</font> duration increased by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Upgrade_VoidGauntlet_Scream_BonusDurVsLowHP.TargetStatusEffectDurationMod]}s</font> on targets below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Upgrade_VoidGauntlet_Scream_BonusDurVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">fortify</font> for each enemy hit, increasing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Scream_Fortify.ABSStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Scream_Fortify.BaseDuration]}s</font> per hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Scream_Fortify.StackMax]} times.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EmpowerLowMana.DMGCorruption * 100]}%</font> damage while below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> mana.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusCritChanceHighHP.CritChance * 100]}%</font> critical chance while above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusCritChanceHighHP.MyHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusCritChanceOnCooldown.CritChance * 100]}%</font> critical chance while all abilities are on cooldown.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDROnCrit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> cooldown reduction on all abilities on critical hit. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Max {[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDROnCrit.NumberOfTrackedHits]} hits per attack.)</font>

Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empower</font> when casting abilities within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_EmpowerCloseRange_Detection.Radius]}m</font> of an enemy, increasing damage by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EmpowerCloseRange.DMGStandard * 100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EmpowerCloseRange.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EmpowerCloseRange.StackMax]} times.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Harvest Essence</font> health drain is reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">50%</font> while below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">25%</font> mana.

On critical hit, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> equal to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_HealOnCrit.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of damage done.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDRVsDebuff.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font> cooldown reduction on all abilities when successfully hitting enemies afflicted by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDRVsDebuff.TargetStatusEffectStackSize]}</font> or more <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font> stacks. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks can be from different debuffs.) (Max {[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDRVsDebuff.NumberOfTrackedHits]} hits per attack.)</font>

On successful ability hit, gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Void Essence</font>. At <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">6</font> stacks, consume all stacks and gain a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_SiphonAura_AoE.Radius]}m</font> aura that <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> self and friendlies for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_SiphonAura_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_SiphonAura_DoT.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second to enemies within. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_SiphonAura_AoE.Duration * .001]}s</font> duration. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) ({[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_SiphonAura_Timer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown.)</font>

Fire an <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">unblockable</font> orb that passes through enemies, deals <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Disintegrate</font>, dealing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.HealthModifierDamageBased * -100]}%</font> weapon damage per second and reducing damage absorption by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.ABSStandard * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Stacks up to {[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_Disintegrate.StackMax]} times.)</font>

At max range, it transforms into a healing orb and returns, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing</font> friendlies for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage per second for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_Heal.BaseDuration]}s</font>. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

Costs <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.76.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.
Gain <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Upgrade_VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_ManaPerHit.Mana * 100]}%</font> mana per enemy hit by the orb.

The orb <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">slows</font> enemies already afflicted by any <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuff</font>, reducing their movement speed by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_SlowVsDebuff.MoveSpeedMod * -100]}%</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_SlowVsDebuff.BaseDuration]}s.</font>

Press the ability input again to detonate the orb with a <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_Detonate_Heal_AoE.Radius]}m</font> explosion radius. Depending on the orb's phase, the explosion will either damage enemies for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[DamageTable.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_Detonate_Damage.DmgCoef * 100]}%</font> weapon damage and apply a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Disintegrate</font> or <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heal</font> friendlies for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DecayingOrb_Detonate_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

Fire a projectile that tethers you to an enemy for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Weaken.BaseDuration]}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">weakening</font> it and <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">empowering</font> you by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Weaken.DMGCorruption * -100]}%</font> per second. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Weaken.DMGCorruption * Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Weaken.ScaleAmountOverTimeMax * -100]}% maximum.)</font>

The tether ends early if the target moves beyond <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether.Radius]}m</font>.

Costs <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.77.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Successful hits against the tethered target reduce other Void Gauntlet cooldowns by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Upgrade_VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_CDROnHit.CooldownTimer * -100]}%</font>.
<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_ManaRegen.ManaRate * 100]}%</font> mana regeneration while the tether is active.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Heal</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_DrainingTether_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage if the tethered target dies. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

Fire a projectile that inflicts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Essence Rupture</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture.BaseDuration]}s</font>, <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healing</font> anyone that hits the target for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> of the damage done. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Does not apply to damage-over-time or damage done to inanimate objects.)</font>\n\nCosts <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[ManaCosts_Player.78.ManaCost]}</font> Mana.

Allies additionally receive <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_Heal_Stamina.Stamina]}</font> stamina when hitting the afflicted target.

Friendlies within <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[SpellDataTable_VoidGauntlet.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_Heal_AoE.Radius]}m</font> of the afflicted target are <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">healed</font> for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_EssenceRupture_AoE_Heal.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> of your weapon damage when Essence Rupture ends. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.)</font>

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusHvyDmgVsRange.BaseDamage * 100]}%</font> damage on successful ranged heavy attacks against targets more than <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusHvyDmgVsRange.DistFromDefender]}m</font> away.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">+{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_ManaPerLightVsDebuff.Mana * 100]}%</font> mana per successful ranged light attack against targets afflicted by your Void Gauntlet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">debuffs</font>.

Mana costs are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_ReducedManaCostHighMana.ManaCostMult * -100]}%</font> while above <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_ReducedManaCostHighMana.MyManaPercent]}%</font> mana.

Cooldowns are reduced by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_CDRWhileHarvest.CooldownTimer * -200]}%</font> per second while performing <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Harvest Essence</font>.

<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Healing</font> from ranged heavy attacks is increased by an additional <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusHvyHealVsLowHP.DmgPctToHealth * 100]}%</font> of damage dealt if the target is below <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusHvyHealVsLowHP.TargetHealthPercent]}%</font> health.

Successful ranged heavy attacks increase the duration of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">non-crowd control debuffs</font> you have applied by <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Passive_VoidGauntlet_BonusDebuffDurOnHvy.TargetStatusEffectDurationMult * 100]}%</font>.

Dodging with full mana <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">heals</font> you for <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_HealOnDodgeMaxMana.HealthModifierDamageBased * 100]}%</font> weapon damage. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">(Healing scales exclusively with Focus.) ({[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_HealOnDodgeMaxMana_Timer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown.)</font>

Gain a stack of <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">Void Essence</font> per successful ability hit. At <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">{[VoidGauntletAbilityTable.Ultimate_VoidGauntlet_CDROnStackConsume.StatusEffectStackSize]}</font> or more stacks, your next successful ranged heavy attack will instantly reset all Void Gauntlet <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_SemiBold.font" color="#ffd45f">cooldowns</font> and remove all stacks. <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Regular_Italic.font" color="#828282">({[Type_StatusEffectData.VoidGauntlet_SiphonConversion_Timer.BaseDuration]}s cooldown.)</font>
